content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was negotiating the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question was asked and answered before the prompt change in response to the new policy.]

[Answer to the updated question]
Answer: No
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The landlord offered 1000 euros, which I found to be too high. I was willing to pay 900 euros, but he was not willing to meet my price.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer to the updated question]
Answer: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as an 8. The negotiation was conducted professionally, but the disagreement on the price did not impact my overall impression of him.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer to the updated question]
Answer: I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point of the negotiation.
name: Maryam Abbasi
